author: Reuters Editorial
title: Albaraka Turk Gets Murabaha Syndicated Loan Worth $245.0 Mln And Eur 60.0 Mln With 370 Days Tranche
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - ALBARAKA TURK:
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY GETS MURABAHA SYNDICATED LOAN WORTH $245.0 MILLION AND EUR 60.0 MILLION FROM 17 BANKS ACROSS 8 COUNTRIES WITH 370 DAYS TRANCHE
* COSTS OF LOAN TO BE LIBOR+125 BPS AND EURIBOR+115 BPS Source text for Eikon:
 (Gdynia Newsroom)
